description:
Screenshot in time tracker is not working in fedora, and no warning mesages provided on that.
Everything else, it's working good.
Dev team decide to go back to Xorg, that will not be supported anymore in Fedora in future release.

I just downloaded this app, and it went smoothly, no effort from my part. I am giving 5 stars based on how easy was installing this on Fedora. Gotta update the review after using it, but I can tell from now on it will fit my needs as I can even chat through this app which is awesome! Thank you Upwork team! You rock!
Install flawlessly , Also can get the autologin from browser.
